name: DownUp
description:
Game made in 4h for trijam 80

The theme was "What goes up (must come down)"

https://itch.io/jam/trijam-80

You have to use the platforms to stay on screen while the game screen scrolls automatically.

Change gravity direction to control where your character goes.

The speed increases every 5th floor.

Reach the 100th floor to win the game!

Inspired by VVVVVV and Icy Tower

everything was made during the jam

Controls:

left and right arrows to move

space to change gravity direction

Restart the page if game over
